pr_title: fix: make field with @Id nullable in TypeScript

timeline.message: fix: make field with @Id nullable in TypeScript
Merge branch 'haijian/id-nullable' of https://github.com/vaadin/flow into haijian/id-nullable

timeline.bodyText:
This assert is related to a non-null value 1l above, so the message seems incorrect to me.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    Assert.assertNull("Method with @Id annotation should allow null value",
          
          
            
                    Assert.assertNull("Method with @Id annotation should allow non-null value",

platosha
